title: RBI Grade B-  FM - FLM1 - Descriptive

quiz.text:
Ques.1) What do you mean by non-performing asset (NPA)? Discuss the major factors behind accumulation of non-performing assets in the Indian banking sector?
[Marks: 10, Word Limit: 400, Difficulty Level: Easy]

Ques.1) Discuss the Big Five Model of personality. What are its limitation?
[Marks: 15, Word Limit: 600, Difficulty Level: Easy]

Ques.2) “Financial Inclusion is increasingly getting support from World community”. Explain with examples. Also discuss the efforts being made by India in this direction.
[Marks: 10, Word Limit: 400, Difficulty Level: Easy]

Ques.2) What is money market? Explain the various Money Market Instruments?
[Marks: 15, Word Limit: 600, Difficulty Level: Easy]

Ques.3) Discuss Herzberg’s theory of motivation and also bring out its limitation.
[Marks: 10, Word Limit: 400, Difficulty Level: Easy]

Ques.3) Distinguish between: —
(a) Verbal and Non-verbal Communication
(b) Ethics and Morality.
(c)Organizational Change and Organizational Development
[Marks: 15, Word Limit: 600, Difficulty Level: Easy]
